body.p:
228
Feby 27th 5
Thos E. Kirtley
Nashville -- Tenn
Sir

Your letter to His Excellency the Governor has been referred to this office for reply. It is not the intention to authorize "Independent Companies" in the state. If suitable arrangements can be made a regularly organized State force will be put in the field, in which event, your application will be considered

very Respy
D, W, Lindsey
Insp & Ajdt Genl Ky
